acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params.configs: Array of token configurations including swap and market parameters.

calcLoanAmount(address,address,uint256).details: Assumes loanToken (USDC/Other stablecoins) are always valued at $1.

params.userCollateralAmount: Amount of collateral user is supplying.

returns._0: amountToBorrow Amount of stablecoin that can be borrowed.

params.morphoAddress: Address of the Morpho protocol contract.
params.oracleRouter: Address of the oracle router for price feeds.
params.pendleRouter: Address of the Pendle router for swap execution.

getAmountUserCollateralCap().details: This cap limits the total collateral a single user can utilize for leveraging purposes in a single attempt.

params.collateralToken: Token used as collateral in the position.

returns.amountRepay: Equivalent amount in loan token required for repayment.

params.collateralToken: The address of the collateral token used in the leverage position.
params.loanToken: The address of the token borrowed in the core leverage position.

returns._0: position The user's core leverage position including collateral amount and borrowed shares.

params.params: Struct containing leverage parameters including collateral, loan token, collateral amount, and other swap configs.

returns.amountTotalCollateral: The net increase in the user's collateral in the market after leverage.
returns.sharesBorrowed: The net increase in borrowed shares after leverage.

onMorphoFlashLoan(uint256,bytes).details: Delegates handling to either _handleLeverage or _handleUnleverage based on Action enum.

params.data: Encoded data used to determine action and pass parameters.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Intentionally disabled to retain upgradeability and collateral support management.

setAmountUserCollateralCap(uint256).details: Only callable by the contract owner to update the collateral cap.

params.newAmountUserCollateralCap: The new collateral cap to be set for users.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

params.params: Struct containing all parameters required to unwind leverage, including token addresses, shares to burn, optional collateral withdrawal amount, and swap/limit order data.

LIQUIDATION_BUFFER().notice: Buffer subtracted from liquidation LTV to reduce liquidation risk (5%).

addSupportedCollateralTokens((address,ad.notice: Allows owner to add support for new collateral tokens.

calcLoanAmount(address,address,uint256).notice: Calculates the maximum loan amount based on the user's collateral.

getAmountUserCollateralCap().notice: Returns the maximum amount of collateral that a user is allowed to leverage.

getMaxLtv(address,address).notice: Returns the maximum allowed loan-to-value ratio after applying liquidation buffer.

getSharesToAsset(address,address,uint256.notice: Calculates the amount of loan token needed to repay borrowed shares.

getTokenUsdValue(address,uint256).notice: Returns the USD value of a token amount.

getUserLeveragePosition(address,address,.notice: Returns the core leverage position of a user for a given collateral and loan token pair.

leverage((address,address,uint256,(uint2.notice: Creates/Modifies users leveraged position by supplying stable PT-collateral and borrowing stablecoins via flashloan.

renounceOwnership().notice: Overrides renounceOwnership to prevent ownership renunciation.

setAmountUserCollateralCap(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum collateral amount that a user can leverage.

unleverage((address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Closes or reduces an existing leveraged position and returns the remaining amount (in USDC) to the position owner.
